channel.title: Funiest Fing Thats Hapend In Ur Life
channel.description:
hi im wundering whats your funniest ever moments
heres mine Well i went paint balling with somefreinds and there's a man called predator there who wears armour and u cant hurt him when u shoot him and he cant see he can only see u when ur moving. Anywayz we were all in the hut then the predator walked in and he put a gun to our heads n walked out so i said cheeky basterd and shot him in the back of his head and then i ducked he shot my mate in the balls and my mate fell out of the hut window
Lmao that was the most amusing thing in my life

item.title: Funiest Fing Thats Hapend In Ur Life
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

Well…
One time, I was at a dirt bike track and I was going around a corner…
Some guy rode past with a shirt on that had a picture of a naked chick on it,(The guy was a bit fat so the naked chick was even bigger!) and while staring at it, I slammed my front wheel into a rock and slammed my balls into the handle bars, while my head went into the side of the rock and my bike was still being reved and jamming into my poor poor balls…
They were purple for a long time…
I couldnt whack off for a month…
But as soon as I could…the image of the shirt magically appeared.

Wasnt funny at the time. It hurt…But when I look back on it now…It still isnt funny, but it reminds me of the hot naked chick on his shirt…and I’m still aroused…

Read full topic

item.title: Funiest Fing Thats Hapend In Ur Life
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Not the funniest fing but here it goes…

First off my brother josh lives in upper michigan and he is what some would call a redneck.
Anyhow my mom, brother Jason, my girlfriend Hannah, and I went up to see Josh for a weekend and it was full of funny things but the best one was when Jason and I were following Josh on some back roads heading into town and Josh’s Wagoneer ran out of gas. So we stopped Josh told his other brother Tony to steer the waggy, but no one knew what he was doing until he walked back to Jason and I made Jason get in the back of (his own) truck and then he slowly pulled foward to the waggy and yelled out to Tony to put it in nutrual. We then proceded to push Joshes waggy into and through the nearest town which was around 10 miles from where we were. Lol it was funny seeing other peoples faces on the highway when we were pushing the waggy going 65+ mph. then it was really funny when we drove through downtown and stopped at a dinner to get something to eat before we went to the gas station…haha that was a good time.

Read full topic

my friend was climbing a tree right. he climbed like 2 metres high.
he was getting a ball, and then he got it, slipped down and
he greased the line of skin between your crack and your sacks.
he had to get 15 stiches lol. it was so funny i couldnt stop laughing for like 5 minutes and i was crying lol! :D[/quote]

i got crap memerory so i cant remeber the funniest “fing” that evr happened to me… good thread though ill be keeping and eye on it = ]

item.title: Funiest Fing Thats Hapend In Ur Life
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

I can’t really think of the funniest, there are so many.
This is by far not the funniest, but the funniest thing I can remember at the moment.
At the house I used to live in, we had a boiling water faucet. Which is very convenient if you want to make like ramen noodles or something because you just press down the button and instantly comes boiled water and it lasts for so long before having to get a new filter.

Well, I was having a party at my house, but it wasn’t the time to start yet so there were only 8-10 people there, including me, my cousin, and my stepcousin.
I guess a cat or my dog shit in the middle of the hallway and my stepcousin(Clint) was doing something weird, crawling on his hands and knees down the hallway. Well obviously, he gets animal shit all over his left hand. He’s not the brightest in the world, so he takes his shitty hand over to the boiling water fountain, and proceeds to use boiling water to wash the shit off of his hand. He gets like a major burn, plus the stench multiplied!!! :rolleyes:

Read full topic
